definition: a dark bituminous substance found in natural beds and as residue from petroleum distillation, to cover with tar or asphalt
details:
noun
- a dark bituminous substance found in natural beds and as residue from petroleum distillation
= synonyms: mineral pitch
- mixed asphalt and crushed gravel or sand
verb
- to cover with tar or asphalt
= example: to cover with tar or asphalt
